# Calvia Health

Calvia Health is a health-service matching platform for residents and visitors in Calvia, Mallorca.
We help users find vetted providers across medical, wellness, lifestyle, insurance, and spa/hotel categories.

## Canonical Site
- https://calvia.health/

## Core Pages
- Home: https://calvia.health/
- Services: https://calvia.health/services
- About: https://calvia.health/about
- Blog: https://calvia.health/blog
- FAQ: https://calvia.health/faq
- Get Matched: https://calvia.health/get-matched

## Data & Discovery
- Sitemap: https://calvia.health/sitemap.xml
- Extended LLM Index: https://calvia.health/llms-full.txt

## Usage Notes
- Content is informational only and not medical advice.
- For emergencies in Spain, call 112.
- Last reviewed: 2026-02-13
